FuncDef: This command specifies an application profile name.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the application profile name, up to 32 characters in length.

Specifies the scope to which the application profile is assigned, in the config>service>vprn>sub-if>grp-if>sap>static-host context. Values-subscriber-The application profile applies to this context with subscriber scope (all hosts or devices).. ParamDefault: Default- subscriber
